text:
#Chloroquine "has a place…[But] it has to be prescribed by a physician.”

Doctors can prescribe chloroquine off-label, but it has side effects & can be dangerous for those on other drugs or with irregular heartbeats.

Dr. Steven Hatfill on #ATL🇺🇸
 
WATCH: https://t.co/KUJfMBXjTD https://t.co/JtaGfFo4l2
